actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow for an unlimited number of shareholders in an S corporation if all of the shareholders are members of the same family.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt S corporations from the limitation on the number of shareholders if all the shareholders are members of the same family.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow for an unlimited number of shareholders in an S corporation if all of the shareholders are members of the same family.
